author: farcaller
body:
## Steps to reproduce

1. Install powershell7 into WSL2/ubuntu following the official installation procedure (via apt).
2. `chsh -s /opt/microsoft/powershell/7/pwsh`

## Expected behavior

Opening a new "Ubuntu" terminal will launch WSL2 environment with Ubuntu running pwsh

## Actual behavior

```
: 6: export: Files/PlasticSCM5/server:/mnt/c/Program: bad variable name

[process exited with code 2]
```

## Environment data

<!-- provide the output of $PSVersionTable -->

```none

----                           -----

PSEdition                      Core
GitCommitId                    7.1.1

Platform                       Unix
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0…}
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1
WSManStackVersion              3.0
```

## Notes

Running pwsh from within a bash login shell works. pwsh reports the following env:
